inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Enhanced MRI shows a pituitary tumor

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Endoscopic surgery is required according to the pituitary tumor treatment guidelines.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient has Karnofsky performance status ≥ 70

inclusion.label: met

not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of pregnancy or lactation

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly due to pituitary adenoma and underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He takes only vitamin D and multivitamins after the surgery.
